      class  FrameVector2D
      FrameVector2D is a 2D vector expressed in a given reference frame.

    • Uses of FrameVector2DBasics in us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame.interfaces

      Methods in us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame.interfaces that return FrameVector2DBasics 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default FrameVector2DBasics FrameLineSegment2DReadOnly.direction​(boolean normalize)
      Computes the vector going from the first to the second endpoint of this line segment.
      default FrameVector2DBasics FrameLine2DReadOnly.perpendicularVector()
      Returns the vector that is perpendicular to this line and pointing to the left.
      Methods in us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame.interfaces with parameters of type FrameVector2DBasics 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void FrameLineSegment2DReadOnly.direction​(boolean normalize, FrameVector2DBasics directionToPack)
      Computes the vector going from the first to the second endpoint of this line segment.
      default void FrameLine2DReadOnly.get​(FramePoint2DBasics pointToPack, FrameVector2DBasics directionToPack)
      Gets the point and direction defining this line by storing their components in the given arguments pointToPack and directionToPack.
      default void FrameLine2DReadOnly.get​(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DBasics pointToPack, FrameVector2DBasics directionToPack)
      Gets the point and direction defining this line by storing their components in the given arguments pointToPack and directionToPack.
      default void FrameLineSegment2DReadOnly.perpendicular​(boolean normalize, FrameVector2DBasics perpendicularVectorToPack)
      Computes the vector perpendicular to the direction of this line segment.
      default void FrameLine2DReadOnly.perpendicularVector​(FrameVector2DBasics vectorToPack)
      Packs into vectorToPack the vector that is perpendicular to this line and pointing to the left.

    • Uses of FrameVector2DBasics in us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame.tools

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean EuclidFrameTools.perpendicularBisector2D​(FramePoint2DReadOnly lineSegmentStart, FramePoint2DReadOnly lineSegmentEnd, FramePoint2DBasics bisectorStartToPack, FrameVector2DBasics bisectorDirectionToPack)
      Computes the perpendicular bisector of line segment defined by its two endpoints.
      static void EuclidFrameTools.perpendicularVector2D​(FrameVector2DReadOnly vector, FrameVector2DBasics perpendicularVectorToPack)
      Computes the vector perpendicular to the given vector such that: vector.dot(perpendicularVector) == 0.0.
